tool_description: An external API to manage a bookstore.
name: Books API
title: Books API

api_list.name: /books
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://books-api9.p.rapidapi.com/books"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "books-api9.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://books-api9.p.rapidapi.com/books"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "books-api9.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
